about_the_game:
Enjoy the popular card game with 150 different solitaire variants and a beautiful winter ambiance!
The game includes solitaire variants such as Freecell, Fan, Four Seasons, Klondike, Spider, Bakers Dozen, Canfield, Golf, Sir Tommy and many more.
For each solitaire variant there is also a helpful tutorial during the game, so that even unknown game variants can be learned quickly.
If you wish, you can view information about each card during the game. Happy Wonderland offers many different card decks, card backs and backgrounds.

Suitable for beginners as well as avid solitaire players, this collection offers many hours of enjoyable solitaire fun and challenging gameplay.


The special features of "Happy Wonderland Solitaire":
- 150 solitaire variants with winter and Christmas ambience
- Various, hand-drawn card sets and matching cover sheets and backgrounds
- Easy-to-understand help for quick start and easy handling
